summary:
I’m an entrepreneur and marketer with over seven years of experience in building and scaling impact-focused brands. 

Recently, I helped reshape the global food system at Mosa Meat by telling the story of a new category: cultivated meat. Prior to this, I co-founded my own business in the organic food space and worked with startups, multi-national companies and non-profits on building and scaling sustainable brands.

I have worked in the United States, Netherlands and India, in addition to residing in the United Kingdom, Switzerland, France and Singapore. I thrive in multi-cultural environments and am passionate about promoting diversity & inclusion in these communities. I am a results-driven and people-oriented leader with strong creative and entrepreneurial initiative.

Specialties: Marketing, Communications, Entrepreneurship, Public Relations,Alternative Proteins, Cultivated Meat, Food & Beverage businesses, Education, Startups, Intrapreneurship, Social Impact, Corporate Responsibility, Leadership, Emerging Markets, Hospitality, Organic Food, Diversity & Inclusion
